result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael F Bender was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Theft-Movable Property >$5000-$10,000 [Modifiers: Repeater], a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).
  • Theft-False Representation <=$2500 [Modifiers: Repeater], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(d).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Michael F Bender
parties.address: 2909 E Park Ave, Chippewa Falls, WI 54729

parties.name: Dane County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes: Each ct concur. Transfer of probation authorized to Portage Co.

miscConds.notes: Crt signed order.   To be collected by the Department of Corrections.  Court financial obligations shall be paid at the rate of 25% of the prison wages and work release funds.  Restitution shall be paid pursuant to separate court order.  The balance remaining at release from prison be paid as a condition of extended supervison or parole at a rate determined by the supervising agent.
$250 DNA surcharge remitted. $278  to be paid by the defendant to the Clerk of Courts office within 60 days.
Psychiatric/psychological evaluation as deemed appropriate by agent and treatment as recommended.
Not to conduct any sales on the internet.

File tax returns each yr w/ copy to agent and any funds to restitution.  Pay supervision fees as determined by the Department of Corrections.  Defendant advised of requirement to provide DNA sample.  Any other conditions DOC, Probation/Parole Department may impose.
Maintain full-time employment/education or combination of or be seeking same, and treatment.

timeConds.notes: With huber. Credit does NOT apply.  Transfer of jail authorized to Portage Co.

supervisions.notes:
Consec to Portage Co Case 14CF305, Marathon Co Case 14CF863 and Outagamie Co case 14CF969.  Defendant is not eligible for the Challenge Incarceration Program.  Defendant is not eligible for the Substance Abuse Program.
1/9/19 Crt orders def is entitled to 276 days of pre-sentence credit and is statutorily eligible for the Earned Release Program.

superMiscConds.notes: Defendant advised of requirement to provide DNA sample-on file.  Any other conditions DOC, Probation/Parole Department may impose.

miscConds.notes: $243  to be paid by the defendant to the Clerk of Courts office within 60 days.
All other conditions are the same as count 1 (except jail time).
